sentences.sContent: As a magician, his reputation spread all over the world.
sentences.sCn: 作为一个魔术师，他的名声传播到了世界各地。

sentences.sContent: Roll up, roll up! See how the magician performs his tricks!
sentences.sCn: 快来看，快来看!看看魔术师怎么表演他的魔术!

sentences.sContent: The children's eyes goggled as the magician pulled a rabbit out of the empty hat.
sentences.sCn: 当魔术师从空帽子中拉出兔子时，孩子们瞪大眼睛看着。

words.tran: 不可思议的；有魔力的；魔术的

trans.tranOther: a man in stories who can use magic
